title: ScreenShoter
description: Take a screentshot for the whole viewport or capture the custom region pitcure.
longDescription: You can take a screentshot for the whole viewport or capture the custom region pitcure. If you want to take a picture without UMG, uncheck the option "Capture UI". If you want to paste the picture to some other place directly, check the option "CopyToClipboad". You can multiple the size of the picture you took via the option "SizeMultiplier".
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Take a screentshot for the whole viewport or capture the custom region pitcure.
  •  Take a picture with or without UMG.
  •  Copy to clipboad so that you paste the picture to anywhere you want to.
  • Multiple the size of the picture you want to.

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • ScreenShoter
  •  
  •  

Number of Blueprints:1(DemoUmg)

Number of C++ Classes:5

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TYtADfHk4ZdrxlQ8Lk8ZZP1X8-5fAgj4/view?usp=drive_link

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YdNHz5k3YEN-00_t1S24BPeJdhRTM2sh/view?usp=drive_link

Important/Additional Notes:

The value of the "SizeMultiplier" is better less than 4.
